topics.body:
I just took my driver workshop which lasted for 6 hours.
And now I probably have to take it again because I forgot to stamp my thumb when it ended.

All I could say was "WHY DIDN'T THEY TELL ME THIS EARLIER OR MAYBE GIVE EVERYONE A WARNING?! FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU-"

So, yeah.

I just wanted to share that.
